dct_title_s: Chart of the world on Mercator's projection showing the direction of the ocean currents, with the routes and distances between the principal ports
dct_description_sm: In margin: 3. World map on Mercator's projection, showing the route of Challenger Expedition in 1873-1874. Probably issued as plate 3 in: Bradley's atlas of the world for commercial and library reference. Philadelphia : Wm. M. Bradley & Bros., 1884.
